comments.comment: I’m so grateful for coming into our capybaras petting zoo. We’re so glad you spent a great time with our cuties. Thank you so much.
You look so happy exploring Japan, biking around, shopping, wacky foods. It is great to see you are legitimately enjoing yourself pewds.
These are very genuine vlogs and I really appreciate them.

First of all it's so nice to see Marzia on camera again. She seems so comfortable and happy. And second of all. You all look so happy and in the right place even eggy and maya. Happy for you guys I live seeing the videos of you 4 happy and living the life

Pewds vlogs became different throughout the years. But one thing that still hasn’t change is it still takes me to a peaceful place. From the playthroughs, lwaiy, live streams, react vids and to this. Thanks Pewds!
Pewdipie out here living his best life and, honestly, I'm just really glad for him. Watching this was so chill and really made me just relax and smile.
The content smile on his face makes me so happy for him. Went from screaming at barrels to proud husband and quiet Japan resident.

Imagine Watching him playing horror games talking to barrels when I was a 13 year old until now I`m at work still watching him you`re one of my favorite youtuber pewds, I`m very happy to see you over and over again I wish you all the best ..
This feels like that one episode at the end of a series where the characters are just living happily and enjoying themselves. Hopefully no last 5 seconds scene that teases a second season o_o

As someone whose lives in Japan for 9 years, I highly suggest doing the Tokyo Bay night tour. I got so many beautiful photos and it has a wonderful view. It’s a dinner cruise and you take the boat all the way around Tokyo Bay and you can see so many cool places. Glad to see you enjoying Japan!

Pewds (talking about Edgar): "He gets so many looks cause he's the cutest dog in the world" 
Maya (while sitting in a bag on his chest): (¬_ )
Seeing Felix out here being so happy and living his best life, is honestly so wholesome and pleasing.

You know working at a vet clinic I see so many old fat pugs come in that sound like they can't breathe for a single second of the remaining days of their lives. And I have never ever EVER heard Maya or Edgar make those kind of breathing noises in any of your videos. You guys take such fantastic care of them, Maya looks so good for her age and so content
Felix' content is just him enjoying his time, enjoying life, being happy, and that makes us happy. I love this.
Possibly the happiest we've ever seen him? Utter bliss coming from these videos
I feel like the audience has all been let in on some pretty beautiful personal moments. The way they are shot and paced do these moments justice. A beautiful new style of videos

I love these videos. There's something so emotional about watching Pewds and Marzia walk around their new home with gentle and genuine smiles on their faces. This video is nothing but peaceful and quiet moments, and I can't help but have the biggest smile on my face watching them just be so happy. You guys are awesome and deserve every bit of success and joy that you have !
These new style of vids really makes me feel like pewds is enjoying Japan a lot more than he thought he would️

Felix, this is probably going to get lost in the sea of comments but, just wanted to say that the Japan vlogs are very cozy and relaxing to watch, and it's always a pleasant surprise to see a new one in my sub feed after a stressful day at work. You two beautiful souls never fail to make me smile, and I wish you both the happiest of days!
11:50 Pewds saying: "Holy cow! That's amazing!" Was right on beat with the music.
I’ve been watching pewds for over 10 years, and it makes me sad seeing the doggies get old  So thankful they have the best people to take care of them ️

Seeing maya thriving brings a tear to my eye ive been watching pewds for almost a decade and ive seeing him and marzia and edgar and maya all grow and its awesome to see hes so happy doing what he wants
I like seeing the man just happy he's worked really hard. He's just human and now he can be happy living with his family in their own promise land.
Makes me teary eyed when I watch these vlogs because I'm just so happy for Pewds and Marzia. They're living my dream and I get to experience it with them.

Pewd's has become a fulltime vlogger, and I'm completely fine with it.

Lived in Japan for a year, and these vids just give me so much nostalgia.
It’s genuinely so heartwarming to see you and Marzia so happy in Japan.

for the biggest YouTuber you have the most positive fans, and there’s a reason for that. You are such a genuinely cool guy we all just root for your success and happiness. Glad to see Japan has been everything you were hoping it to be. I hope to see a continuation of these awesome vlogs around Japan. Much love pewds.

I am Japanese.

11:00

This does not mean that you should not bark at humans.
It is a picture of a dog who finds a suspicious person and bravely barks to inform humans of the danger.
Dogs are described in Japan as the police that protect peace.
The sign says "If you find a suspicious person, please report it to the police."
I think the sign at 10:58 says 不審者を見かけたら１１０番, which doesn't mean that Edgar should be quiet, but rather "If you see someone suspicious, call 110"
7:19 This is the most Japanese thing I've ever seen. A city worker on a sign bowing to say sorry about the inconvenience of road work. I love it!

This man is literally winning his life. Successful and calming life, a loving wife and pets, retired young. He can do anything especially because he is still in his 30s. Becoming better mentally, physically and you will have a good retirement. Such a spot any person would kill for.
Fun fact: hydrangeas will be different colors depending on the soil they’re growing in, I’ve personally seen blue, white, and pink.
I love how you guys are so humble and down to earth. No showing off with fancy cars or clothes, no stupid pranks etc. Youre just enjoying life and going on adventures..
11:48 That "whoa, holy cow" was perfecfectly in sync with the music. For a second I thought pewds was about to go in with the beat
4:36 I love how beautiful these shots are. Looks so pretty there. ^^ These vlogs feel very relaxing. Very fun to watch!

FYI Felix, if you notice the guy in the shot @ 8:23 has a tag with a heart hanging on his bag. It is called a Help Mark. Its a sign that someone has an unnoticeable from the outside and might need help if something ever happens.
11:47 that "wow holy cow, that's amazing" was perfectly edited to the beat.
I could watch these all day.  Such wonder and warm heartening goodness.

Felix is in such a happy state of being that he sounds curious about things he already knows the answer to, so it will liven the experience. He shows humility even in the smallest scenarios. If everyone was like this the world would be a better place.
This whole series brings me such great joy. Felix, Marzia, and pups living their best lives. ️

I smile so big when I watch these because it makes
me happy seeing you so happy in Japan :')
Rest Easy Shinzo Abe
The pacing, the music, the scenery, this whole video is a soothing adventure with friends, cheers!

This is like retirement pewds. 

He's just having fun and sharing his experience with us.
14:58  he pullin up fr

I cant get enough of this. The cozy feeling your videos bring me these days is something special. Thank you <3

This is currently my favorite series of 2022. I get so excited when a new PewDiePie Japan vlog drops. A chance to forget about the stresses of life and spend roughly 20 minutes immersed in pure serenity. I hope the vlogs continue
15:45 OKAY I PULL UP HOP OUT AT THE AFTER PARTY
when i was younger i used to binge watch all your old vids. seeing youve come so far and enjoying japan makes me zo happy <3 wishing you and marzia & the doggies all the best pewds!!
It makes me smile seeing the dogs so happy and looking like they’ve adjusted really well.
If she wants small puffer, look up dwarf pea puffers. They are freshwater. Great in a planted tank but if you want tank mates you need 2-3 and a larger tank

I love this guy
These new style of vids really makes me feel like pewds is enjoying Japan a lot more than he thought he would
Awesome to hear Pewds speaking Japanese. He sounds great for how short he's been in Japan.
i’ve watched your content change over so many years, since i was 14… I’m now 21 and you seem so much happier, even just your videos feel more relaxed and i’m just so happy for you

the fact Maya is a pug and is still going strong is absolutely amazing, what a good life she lives! sundowning is just her old lady partying phase lol (pugs have the shortest lifespan of all dogs! there is even debate about no longer breeding pugs due to their genetic issues)
His videos really makes me feel how calm and peaceful life in Japan is

最近の動画欠かさず見てます！引越ししてきたばかりの真新しさと、Pew独自の感性が相まって、最近の動画にはめっちゃ癒されてる！日本人でも知らないスポット開拓してますね笑
日本語の勉強も続けてるのすごいな〜！
Love watching these vlogs, I want to visit Japan someday
The hard part is when these vlogs come to an end. I don’t get tired of saying it. They’re so refreshing and uplifting. I’m so happy for you guys and your new home
Watching pewds for years and now seeing him and marzia just go around japan and be happy is heartwarming
Im so happy i started watching pewdiepie again. I stopped watching for like 7 months maybe and a-lot has apparently happened. Im so happy for him and marzia for finally being able to get to japan

Not gonna lie, I’ve had a really difficult day. Probably one of the worst I’ve had in a while. I’m not even halfway through the video and it’s already made me feel a little better. Thanks Pewds

I've been loving those vlogs, they're so peaceful  and we can tell how happy you guys are. 
I'm really glad you were able to move to Japan :)
Reading through these comments makes me so happy. I love to see everyone being so happy for him

Felix, we are all living vicariously through you. I’m so happy that you seem to be living your best life. I love the japan content. I’ve been watching for many years but this is 100% my favorite pewds arc. You deserve this peace and happiness.
glad we got to hear you speak japanese in the wild :) you sound confident, good for you man!! you guys seem like you’re loving every moment there and we love to see it <3

My dude got money, a girl he loves, and is living his life in Japan. Life goals, right there

I’m proud and happy for ya, Pewds!

Thanks for sharing your journey with us!

I love the handwriting in the letter your parents wrote. I’m not sure why, but that really stuck out to me. I hope you are enjoying the next chapter in your life and thanks for taking the time to share with us man. Much love.
Man this just seems like watching someone living a dream of mine, so grateful that you manage to find a way to keep up with your videos!
Super happy seeing Felix living his happiest life now just like seeing a real family member's living happily :)
Hearing Pewds increasingly being able to speak Japanese is my most awaited part in these vlogs

Man, id do anything for one week or even one day of this life.
I never felt so genuinly happy for an other person and i need to say these Vlogs are the most calming ive ever watched.

Guys this is Pewds at the peak of his life and i hope it would be forever for him.
Marzia is a literal beauty shes making every shot even more beautiful just by existing i love her
These Japan vlogs are AWESOME!
The most wholesome content that we all need. It's so nice to see a different side of Japan too - it actually looks quiet and not over crowded. The parks are so pretty too.

Everytime I watch Felix's vlog in Japan with Marzia, I envy how perfect their relationship is. I know that there is no perfect relationship but seeing them live and enjoy their life, made me realize that not taking anything for granted is very important in relationships. Appreciating small things will give us happiness.

These vlogs are so calming, idk if it’s Marzia doing the editing but it’s so peaceful  please don’t stop ️

I’ve never been the biggest vlog person, but Pewds is one of the very few exceptions. I’ve been watching since back when I was in middle school and have watched his channel evolve. I’m so happy to see how he’s doing. He will always be one of my favorite YouTubers. I wish him and the rest of his family and friends the absolute best in this life and the ones after.
Never seen a happier family settle in so fast. Congrats on the move.
loving the old school anime style filming and soundtrack of these vlogs

I've been commenting under every Japan vlog I think but I just love them so much, they're so wholesome and comforting <3 and Marzia's outfits are always so amazing!! happy to be seeing her a lot in the vlogs :D also it's so cute to see Edgar and Maya on their little adventures aww
Seeing how happy you guys are is refreshing, makes me happy about my own goals. Congratulations pewds you earned it
